    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addBitrateChangeListener​(BitrateChangeListener bcl)
      Adds a BitrateChangeListener to this object to receive BitrateChangeEvents.
      void addConnectionChangeListener​(ConnectionChangeListener ccl)
      Adds a ConnectionChangeListener to this object to receive PlayerChangeEvents.
      void addErrorListener​(ErrorListener el)
      Adds a ErrorListener to this object to receive ErrorEvents.
      void addOutputChangeListener​(OutputChangeListener vcl)
      Adds a OutputChangeListener to this object to receive OutputChangeEvents.
      void addPlayerChangeListener​(PlayerBasicChangeListener pcl)
      Adds a PlayerBasicChangeListener to this object to receive PlayerChangeEvents.
      void addPlaylistChangeListener​(PlaylistBasicChangeListener pcl)
      Adds a PlaylistBasicChangeListener to this object to receive PlaylistChangeEvents.
      void addTrackPositionChangeListener​(TrackPositionChangeListener tpcl)
      Adds a TrackPositionChangeListener to this object to receive PlayerChangeEvents.
      void addVolumeChangeListener​(VolumeChangeListener vcl)
      Adds a VolumeChangeListener to this object to receive VolumeChangeEvents.
      boolean isDone()
      Returns true if the monitor is stopped, false if the monitor is still running.
      boolean isLoaded()
      Returns true after the initial statuses have been loaded by the monitor
      void removeBitrateChangeListener​(BitrateChangeListener bcl)
      Removes a BitrateChangeListener from this object.
      void removeConnectionChangeListener​(ConnectionChangeListener ccl)
      Removes a ConnectionChangeListener from this object.
      void removeErrorListener​(ErrorListener el)
      Removes a ErrorListener from this object.
      void removeOutputChangeListener​(OutputChangeListener vcl)
      Removes a OutputChangeListener from this object.

      Removes a PlayerBasicChangeListener from this object.
      void removePlaylistChangeListener​(PlaylistBasicChangeListener pcl)
      Removes a PlaylistBasicChangeListener from this object.
      void removeTrackPositionChangeListener​(TrackPositionChangeListener tpcl)
      Removes a TrackPositionChangeListener from this object.
      void removeVolumeChangeListener​(VolumeChangeListener vcl)
      Removes a VolumeChangeListener from this object.
      void start()
      Starts the monitor by creating and starting a thread using this instance as the Runnable interface.
      void stop()
      Stops the thread.

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Returns true if the monitor is stopped, false if the monitor is still running.
        Returns:
        true if monitor is running, false otherwise false

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()

        Returns:
